MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY1 postcode area of Kirkcaldy, affecting properties in High Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 9:25AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30PM. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:10AM on 21 March 2021.
